text: Predel-E is a Russian military radar system. It is a kind of over-the-horizon radar. Predel-E has been shown since 2017.Ukrainian forces destroy Russian Predel-E radar station: what does it mean? 2023 In 2023 Ukrainian authorities showed a video and said they had destroyed a PREDEL-E station on the Russian- controlled coast of the Crimea peninsula.'Exotic' Russian Radar System Worth $200M Destroyed in HIMARS Strike: Video The nickname of the radar system is "the eyes of Mordor".https://www.nettavisen.no/nyheter/hevder-a-ha-odelagt- topp-moderne-radarsystem/s/5-95-1294730. title: Predel-E
